name: Nobuhiko Okamoto
description: {{Nihongo|'''Nobuhiko Okamoto'''|岡本 信彦|Okamoto Nobuhiko|born October 24, 1986}} is a Japanese [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actor]] and singer affiliated with Raccoon Dog. He won the Best New Actor Award at the [[3rd Seiyu Awards]] and Best Supporting Actor Award at the [[5th Seiyu Awards]].
